sn56.36:1.1: “Seyyathapi, bhikkhave, puriso yam imasmim jambudipe tinakatthasakhapalasam tacchetva ekajjham samhareyya;
sn56.36:1.3: Sulam karitva ye mahasamudde mahantaka pana te mahantakesu sulesu avuneyya, ye mahasamudde majjhimaka pana te majjhimakesu sulesu avuneyya, ye mahasamudde sukhumaka pana te sukhumakesu sulesu avuneyya.
sn56.36:1.4: Apariyadinna ca, bhikkhave, mahasamudde olarika pana assu.
sn56.36:2.1: Atha imasmim jambudipe tinakatthasakhapalasam parikkhayam pariyadanam gaccheyya.
sn56.36:2.2: Ito bahutara kho, bhikkhave, mahasamudde sukhumaka pana, ye na sukara sulesu avunitum.
sn56.36:2.6: Evam mahantasma kho, bhikkhave, apayasma parimutto ditthisampanno puggalo ‘idam dukkhan’ti yathabhutam pajanati …pe… ‘ayam dukkhanirodhagamini patipada’ti yathabhutam pajanati.
sn56.36:3.1: Tasmatiha, bhikkhave, ‘idam dukkhan’ti yogo karaniyo …pe… ‘ayam dukkhanirodhagamini patipada’ti yogo karaniyo”ti.
